welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Chinacota, Colombia! Get ready to experience the charming beauty of our city, known for its captivating landscapes and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Chinacota has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Antonio Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at San Antonio Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Camilo Dazo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Camilo Dazo Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Cristobal Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at San Cristobal Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
